pr_title: Un-revert gRPC client, server, and servlet initial support

timeline.message:
Revert "Revert "gRPC client, server, and servlet initial support""

This reverts commit e808826506d9ae6c12e7d229291350388617b98c.
update grpcServer bundle to build with Bnd 4.3.1
compile grpc bundles with java 11 bytecode when possible

compile grpc bundles with java 11 bytecode when possible;
fix up Eclipse projects
compile grpc bundles with java 11 bytecode when possible and fix up Eclipse projects
compile grpc bundles with java 11 bytecode when possible and fix up Eclipse projects

timeline.bodyText:
noship feaures should have an edition of full.  Same comment in the other feature files.
Should parallel activation be enabled for this feature?
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+-include= ~${workspace}/cnf/resources/bnd/feature.props
+symbolicName=com.ibm.websphere.appserver.internal.grpc-1.0
+singleton=true
+IBM-API-Package: \
+  com.google.protobuf;  type="stable",\
+  io.grpc;  type="stable", \
+  io.grpc.protobuf;  type="stable", \
+  io.grpc.stub;  type="stable", \
+  io.grpc.stub.annotations;  type="stable", \
+  io.grpc.internal; type="internal",\
+Subsystem-Name: gRPC internal 1.0
+-bundles=\
+  com.ibm.ws.grpc.common.1.0
+-features=\
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.artifact-1.0, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.classloading-1.0, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.appmanager-1.0, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.anno-1.0, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.containerServices-1.0,\
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.httptransport-1.0, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.javax.annotation-1.3; ibm.tolerates:=1.2
+kind=noship
+edition=core

timeline.message: noship features should have edition=full; add parallel act. to all features
